text: @gloryfoodsg Thank you for coming up with this Nasi Padang bento idea during such times! Totally satisfied my family’s nasi padang crave! Cust svc was awesome, Food delivery was prompt, food was packed neatly... and upon opening up each box, that spice aroma was amazing! Really made me 🤤... Food quality was top notch! Now we are all left with happy bellies! Thank u @gloryfoodsg for the amazing food experience and how we miss so! 😁

answers.text: @paradoxical_jo Thank you so much for the kind feedback! So happy you and your family enjoy the bento boxes! ❤️
